arc.title: The Weight of Gold
arc.scope: From arrival at the Black Keep to the defeat of the dragon Avarrax

story_overview.premise: An ancient dragon has amassed a hoard so vast that it has quietly strangled the surrounding region. Wealth no longer circulates; cities weaken without being burned. All gold flows toward the Black Keep.
story_overview.arc_start: The party arrives at the Black Keep and realizes it has not been conquered, but fed.
story_overview.arc_end: The confrontation with Avarrax in the throne hall, where possession turns into violence.

pilot_events: Trade routes collapse without open war
Towns abandon defenses due to unpaid guards
Caravans disappear without signs of battle
Records reveal decades of tribute paid to the Black Keep
The party confirms the keep as the source of the region’s economic suffocation

primary_location.name: The Black Keep
primary_location.description: A massive fortress left structurally intact but spiritually hollow, its halls increasingly overtaken by gold rather than people.
primary_location.narrative_function: A place where accumulation replaces purpose

final_scene_location.name: Throne Hall
final_scene_location.description: Once a seat of rule, now buried beneath mountains of gold, shattered stone, and scorched pillars. The hoard dominates the space, bending light and sound.

swordsman.name: Ronan
swordsman.arc_perspective: Views the dragon as a siege engine that must be broken before anything else can recover.

archer.name: Elric
archer.arc_perspective: Has seen villages stripped of defense by lack of funds and focuses on ending the threat efficiently.

magician.name: Seraphine
magician.arc_perspective: Understands that dragon hoards distort reality and that destroying them carries dangerous consequences.

core_motivation.belief: All gold must belong to him, because possession proves dominance.
core_motivation.goal: To remove wealth from circulation and make the world dependent on his hoard.
core_motivation.fear: Loss — not of life, but of possession.

relationship_to_arc.role: The gravitational center of the region’s collapse
relationship_to_arc.view_of_party: Thieves who dare to claim what has already been taken
relationship_to_arc.stance: Will not negotiate, retreat, or relinquish

lair_context.location: Throne Hall of the Black Keep
lair_context.symbolism: A seat of rule replaced by accumulated wealth
lair_context.state: Fully entrenched, hoard at maximum concentration

final_scene.entry_moment: The party steps into the throne hall and sees the hoard for the first time, realizing the scale of what has been removed from the world.
stakes: If Avarrax remains, the region will continue to collapse without open war
If the hoard is destroyed recklessly, the keep may collapse entirely
There is no resolution without loss
